title: End of Watch
plot: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

title: Bonnie and Clyde
plot: Bored waitress  Bonnie Parker  falls in love with an ex-con named  Clyde Barrow  and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

title: Overboard
plot: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia after an accident, he decides to introduce her to regular life by convincing her they're husband and wife.

title: Unknown
plot: When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.

title: Beverly Hills Cop 4
plot: The plot is unknown.

title: The Following
plot: A brilliant and charismatic, yet psychotic serial killer communicates with other active serial killers and activates a cult of believers following his every command.

title: Philadelphia
plot: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

title: Crocodile Dundee
plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

title: When the Boys Meet the Girls
plot: Danny Churchill is a young heir who tries to help Ginger, an attractive postal worker in rural Nevada, save her father's ranch from closing due to being heavily in debt with some Reno ...                 See full summary  »

plot: In a small town, brutal killings start to plague the close knit community. Marty Coslaw, a paraplegic boy, is convinced the murders are the doings of a werewolf.

title: The Holiday
plot: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

title: Greta
plot: A young woman befriends a lonely widow who's harboring a dark and deadly agenda toward her.

title: The Ruins
plot: A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse when a group of friends and a fellow tourist embark on a remote archaeological dig in the jungle, where something evil lives among the ruins.

title: Life on Mars
plot: After being involved in a car accident in 2006, DCI Sam Tyler wakes up to find himself in 1973, the era of 'Sweeney' type policing, Mark III Cortinas, and flared trousers.

title: RED 2
plot: Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

title: F Is for Family
plot: Follow the Murphy family back to the 1970s, when kids roamed wild, beer flowed freely and nothing came between a man and his TV.

title: My Spy
plot: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.

title: Lilo & Stitch
plot: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive.

title: Hit and Run
plot: Former getaway driver Charles Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charles' former gang chase them on the road.

plot: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

title: Miss Sloane
plot: In the high-stakes world of political power-brokers, Elizabeth Sloane is the most sought after and formidable lobbyist in D.C. But when taking on the most powerful opponent of her career, she finds winning may come at too high a price.

title: Antlers
plot: In an isolated Oregon town, a middle-school teacher and her sheriff brother become embroiled with her enigmatic student, whose dark secrets lead to terrifying encounters with a legendary ancestral creature who came before them.

title: Romancing the Stone
plot: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.

title: Soylent Green
plot: A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.

title: The Forever Purge
plot: Plot unknown. The fifth and final installment of 'The Purge' film series.

title: Mosul
plot: A police unit from Mosul fight to liberate the Iraqi city from thousands of ISIS militants.

title: The Last Stand
plot: The leader of a drug cartel busts out of a courthouse and speeds to the Mexican border, where the only thing in his path is a sheriff and his inexperienced staff.

title: Practical Magic
plot: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

title: Wander
plot: After getting hired to probe a suspicious death in the small town of Wander, a mentally unstable private investigator becomes convinced the case is linked to the same 'conspiracy cover up' that caused the death of his daughter.

title: Sometime Other Than Now
plot: Seeking redemption, a middle aged man drives cross the country, in search of the daughter he abandoned as a child.

title: All My Children
plot: Set in the fictional East Coast suburb Pine Valley, this show is the decades-old, risk-taking soap that centers around Erica Kane (Susan Lucci) and her long line of husbands.

title: The Secrets We Keep
plot: In post-WWII America, a woman, rebuilding her life in the suburbs with her husband, kidnaps her neighbor and seeks vengeance for the heinous war crimes she believes he committed against her.

title: The Amazing World of Gumball
plot: The life of a twelve-year-old boy who happens to be a blue cat as he lives with his family and other strange creatures.

title: Zoo
plot: A young scientist searches to find out what's causing a rash of violent animal attacks.

title: Chronicle
plot: Three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.

title: Charlie Wilson's War
plot: A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.

plot: A depressed musician reunites with his lover. Though their romance, which has already endured several centuries, is disrupted by the arrival of her uncontrollable younger sister.

title: Real Steel
plot: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling ex-boxer feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

title: Raatchasan
plot: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

title: The Gift
plot: A painter in Istanbul embarks on a personal journey as she unearths universal secrets about an Anatolian archaeological site and its link to her past.

title: A Good Day to Die Hard
plot: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

title: Sunset Blvd.
plot: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: Charlie's Angels
plot: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

title: Detachment
plot: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.

title: Deadwood: The Movie
plot: As the residents of Deadwood gather to commemorate Dakota's statehood in 1889, saloon owner Al Swearengen and Marshal Seth Bullock clash with Senator George Hearst.

title: Battlefield Earth
plot: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

title: To Wong Foo Thanks for Everything, Julie Newmar
plot: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

title: Mannequin
plot: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

title: Blood Simple
plot: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

title: Red Sonja
plot: The fearless warrior Red Sonja sets out to avenge her family's murder and rid her kingdom from the tyrannical rule of evil Queen Gedren.

title: The Beach Bum
plot: A rebellious stoner named Moondog lives life by his own rules.

title: Mr. Church
plot: "Mr. Church" tells the story of a unique friendship that develops when a little girl and her dying mother retain the services of a talented cook - Henry Joseph Church. What begins as a six month arrangement instead spans into fifteen years and creates a family bond that lasts forever.

title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
plot: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

title: Naandhi
plot: Revolving around undertrial prisoners who languish in jails while awaiting a judgement, the movie follows Surya Prakash who gets caught in a similar situation while being on trial for the murder of a powerful man.

title: The Girlfriend Experience
plot: Anthology television series based on Steven Soderbergh's "The Girlfriend Experience."

title: Push
plot: Two young Americans with special abilities must race to find a girl in Hong Kong before a shadowy government organization called Division does.

title: Angel Heart
plot: A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

title: Step by Step
plot: Two families become one, step by step.

title: Just Shoot Me!
plot: Hot-tempered journalist Maya got herself fired yet again. Unable to find a job anywhere else and facing eviction, she is forced to go work for Blush, her father's fashion magazine.

title: Loudermilk
plot: Centers on Sam Loudermilk, a recovering alcoholic and substance abuse counselor with a bad attitude. Although he has his drinking under control, Loudermilk discovers that when your life is a mess, getting clean is the easy part.

title: The Laundromat
plot: A widow investigates an insurance fraud, chasing leads to a pair of Panama City law partners exploiting the world's financial system.

title: The Adjustment Bureau
plot: The affair between a politician and a contemporary dancer is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

title: Unsolved: The Murders of Tupac and the Notorious B.I.G.
plot: A scripted true crime series based on the murder investigations of Tupac Shakur and Biggie Smalls.

title: Patriot Games
plot: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

title: Fear
plot: When Nicole met David; handsome, charming, affectionate, he was everything. It seemed perfect, but soon she sees that David has a darker side. And his adoration turns to obsession, their dream into a nightmare, and her love into fear.

title: Transplant
plot: An ER doctor, who fled his native Syria to come to Canada, must overcome numerous obstacles to resume a career in the high stakes world of emergency medicine.

title: Fracture
plot: An attorney intending on climbing the career ladder toward success finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he is trying to prosecute.

title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
plot: A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

plot: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

title: Hotel Transylvania
plot: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

title: Chesapeake Shores
plot: A young woman returns to her hometown to help save her sister's failing inn, where she contends with memories and faces from her past.

title: Sensation
plot: When a lowly postman is inducted into a top-secret superhuman DNA program at a research facility, it's revealed that he'll be able to receive, control and send information based on the senses of others.

title: Space Cowboys
plot: When retired engineer Frank Corvin ( Clint Eastwood ) is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

title: Rules of Engagement
plot: Two couples and their single friend, all at different stages in their relationships, deal with the complications of dating, commitment, and marriage.

title: Adu
plot: Three people, three stories, one thing in common: Africa.

title: THX 1138
plot: In the 25th century, a time when people have designations instead of names, a man, THX 1138, and a woman, LUH 3417, rebel against their rigidly-controlled society.

title: Pleasantville
plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

title: Gintama
plot: In an era where aliens have invaded and taken over feudal Tokyo, an unemployed samurai finds work however he can.

title: St. Elsewhere
plot: The lives and work of the staff of St. Eligius Hospital, an old and disrespected Boston teaching hospital.

title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
plot: Laura Palmer's harrowing final days are chronicled one year after the murder of Teresa Banks, a resident of Twin Peaks' neighboring town.

title: The Nest
plot: Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor.

title: The Other Guys
plot: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

title: The Wailing
plot: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

title: Annabelle
plot: A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.

title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
plot: Six teens attending an adventure camp on the opposite side of Isla Nublar must band together to survive when dinosaurs wreak havoc on the island.

title: The Host
plot: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about.

plot: After losing his wife and his memory in a car accident, a single father undergoes an agonizing experimental treatment that causes him to question who he really is.

plot: BOMBAY ROSE is a beautiful hand-painted animation created by award winning animator Gitanjali Rao. Amidst the bustle of a magnetic and multifaceted city, the budding love between two dreamers is tested by duty and religious divides.

plot: Fourteen-year-old Mouse desperately wants to join the Midnight Clique, an infamous group of Baltimore dirt-bike riders who rule the summertime streets.

title: Coraline
plot: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

title: One Day at a Time
plot: The misadventures of a divorced mother, her family, and their building superintendent in Indianapolis.

title: Army Wives
plot: Four women and one man share the common bond of loving someone in the U.S. Army.

plot: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, an insectoid alien race who had previously tried to invade Earth and had inflicted heavy losses on humankind.

plot: A former tech CEO joins an FBI Cybersecurity Agent to stop the emergence of a rogue Artificial Intelligence.

title: Armor Wars
plot: Find out in this series what would happen if Tony Stark's tech fell into the wrong hands.

plot: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

plot: Two sisters contend for the affection of King Henry VIII.

plot: A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

title: Cry-Baby

title: Krypton
plot: The untold story of Superman's grandfather as he fights for justice on his home planet.

title: The Protector

plot: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

plot: In a world where giant humanoid Titans prey on humans, Eren joins the scouting legion to get revenge on the monsters who killed everyone in his town.

plot: Inspired by real events, undercover agents infiltrate a drug kingpin's operation by posing as a couple at the campground where he spends his weekends.

plot: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

plot: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

plot: The story of the first sexual harassment case in Spain was a scandal. Nevenka Fernández, its protagonist, discusses it in this documentary.

plot: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.

plot: Socially inept Miranda always gets into awkward situations; working in her joke shop with best friend Stevie, being hounded by her pushy mother, and around her crush Gary.

plot: A figure skating Olympic hopeful's struggle to balance love, family and fragile mental health as her dream of winning takes a dizzying hold.

plot: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

plot: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red-and-white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of police snitch, Huggy Bear (Antonio Fargas).

plot: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

plot: She-Ra, Princess of Power, leads a rebellion to free her land of Etheria from the monstrous invaders the Horde.

plot: Coral, Wendy and Gina go on the run in search of freedom while being chased by Romeo, their pimp from Las Novias Club, and his henchmen, Moises and Christian.

plot: Newly-elected U.S. President Hunter Franklin and his family move into the White House.

plot: Various mishaps at a police station in an English town. The main character is the anachronistic, yet charming and funny Inspector Fowler. CID foil to Fowler, Inspector Grim is a bumbling, seething idiot.

plot: The adventures of the fast-drivin', rubber-burnin' Duke boys of Hazzard County.

plot: A contemporary drama series set in a challenging comprehensive school.

title: Apostle
plot: In 1905, a drifter on a dangerous mission to rescue his kidnapped sister tangles with a sinister religious cult on an isolated island.

title: My Girl
plot: A young girl, on the threshold of her teen years, finds her life turning upside down, when she is accompanied by an unlikely friend.

title: La Reina del Sur
plot: Teresa Mendoza returns to Mexico after 8 years to fight with Mexican drug dealers.

plot: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

title: Shin Godzilla
plot: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster.

plot: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

plot: A high school senior drives cross-country with his best friends to hook up with a babe he met online.

plot: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

plot: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.

plot: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

plot: Duncan MacLeod is Immortal, and must live in modern society, concealing his true nature while fighting other Immortals.

plot: Before tying the knot, Ollie and Zoe want to try something new.

plot: Follows Bow's parents, Paul and Alicia, who are forced to move from a hippie commune to the suburbs to better provide for their family after the dissolution of their cult.

plot: A woman, Rose, goes in search for her adopted daughter within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill.

title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 3
plot: The third installment of the 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' series which follows the adventures of Newt Scamander.

title: Dinosaurs
plot: This show follows the life of a family of dinosaurs, living in a modern world. They have televisions, refrigerators, et cetera. The only humans around are cavemen, who are viewed as pets and wild animals.

title: Tommy Boy
plot: After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.

title: Rebecca
plot: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: The Boondocks
plot: Adventures of two boys, Riley and Huey Freeman, who undergo a culture clash when they move from Chicago to the suburbs to live with their grandfather.

title: Army of Darkness
plot: A sardonic hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead so he can return home.

title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow
plot: Terror grips a small mountain town as bodies are discovered after each full moon. Losing sleep, raising a teenage daughter, and caring for his ailing father, officer Marshall struggles to remind himself there's no such thing as werewolves.

title: The Hustle
plot: Two con women - one low rent and the other high class - team up to take down the men who have wronged them.

title: You're the Worst
plot: Centers on two toxic, self-destructive people who fall in love and attempt a relationship.

title: Predator 2
plot: The Predator returns to Earth, this time to stake a claim on the war-torn streets of a dystopian Los Angeles.

title: Das Boot
plot: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

title: Artemis Fowl
plot: Artemis Fowl, a young criminal prodigy, hunts down a secret society of fairies to find his missing father.

title: Home Economics
plot: Three grown-up siblings find themselves living at vastly different levels of financial security than each other.

title: Knight Rider
plot: A lone crimefighter battles the forces of evil with the help of a virtually indestructible and artificially intelligent supercar.

title: The Northman
plot: Set in Iceland at the turn of the 10th century, a Nordic prince sets out on a mission of revenge after his father is murdered.

title: Creep
plot: A young videographer answers an online ad for a one-day job in a remote town to record the last messages of a dying man. When he notices the man's odd behavior, he starts to question his intentions.

title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
plot: Lonely thirty-seven-year-old Mikami Satoru is stuck in a dead-end job, unhappy with his mundane life, but after dying at the hands of a robber, he awakens to a fresh start in a fantasy ...                 See full summary  »

title: The Angel
plot: Based on NYT bestselling book 'The Angel: The Egyptian Spy Who Saved Israel' by Uri Bar-Joseph.

title: Romeo and Juliet
plot: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

title: The Love Witch
plot: A modern-day witch uses spells and magic to get men to fall in love with her, with deadly consequences.

title: The Young Pope
plot: The beginning of the pontificate of Lenny Belardo, alias Pius XIII, the first American Pope in history.

title: Notorious
plot: The life and death story of  The Notorious B.I.G.  (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

title: Newness
plot: In contemporary Los Angeles, two millennials navigating a social media-driven hookup culture begin a relationship that pushes both emotional and physical boundaries.

title: NOS4A2
plot: Charlie Manx, a seductive immortal who feeds off the souls of children, has his whole world threatened when a young woman in New England discovers she has a dangerous gift.

title: Get Smart
plot: Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, is tasked with preventing a terrorist attack from rival spy agency KAOS.

title: According to Jim
plot: A television show centered around a macho everyman, his loving wife, and their three precocious children.

title: Freedom Writers
plot: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves and pursue education beyond high school.

title: Spartacus
plot: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.

title: The Expendables 2
plot: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

title: Pet Sematary
plot: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

title: Cold Mountain
plot: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.
"21" is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

title: Annabelle: Creation
plot: Twelve years after the tragic death of their little girl, a doll-maker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they become the target of the doll-maker's possessed creation, Annabelle.

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
plot: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

title: Searching
plot: After his teenage daughter goes missing, a desperate father tries to find clues on her laptop.

title: Christiane F.
plot: A teen girl in 1970's Berlin becomes addicted to heroin. Everything in her life slowly begins to distort and disappear as she befriends a small crew of junkies and falls in love with a drug-abusing male prostitute.

title: Children of the Corn
plot: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believes that everyone over age 18 must be killed.

title: Tacoma FD
plot: Comedic look at firefighters battling their own boredom.

title: The Edge of Seventeen
plot: High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

title: Son of Bigfoot
plot: A teenage boy journeys to find his missing father only to discover that he's actually Bigfoot.

title: Rescue Me
plot: Tommy Gavin deals with the fears of his job as a firefighter and seeing his ex-wife dating other men.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
plot: England in the age of the Vikings is a fractured nation of petty lords and warring kingdoms. Beneath the chaos lies a rich and untamed land waiting for a new conqueror. Will it be you?

title: From Hell
plot: In Victorian-era London, a troubled clairvoyant police detective investigates the murders of Jack the Ripper.

title: One Day
plot: After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Emma are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.

title: Covert Affairs
plot: Fresh out of the farm, Annie Walker must adapt to the challenging life of a CIA operative under the guidance of her handler, Auggie. But soon she realizes her recruit might have to do with her last boyfriend rather than her talent.

title: The Salvation
plot: In 1870s America, the fury of a notorious gang leader is unleashed when a peaceful American settler avenges the death of his family. Then as his cowardly fellow townspeople betray him, he is forced to hunt down the outlaws alone.

title: Treadstone
plot: The Treadstone project, having created super spy Jason Bourne, turns its attention on a new protocol to develop unstoppable superhuman assassins.

title: The Guest Book
plot: For a tiny cottage in a tiny town, this place sure will see lots of baggage. Each episode, new guests will bring their own special brand of crazy to this new TBS comedy from My Name Is Earl (2005) Creator Greg Garcia.

title: Casper
plot: An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.

title: Snakes on a Plane
plot: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

title: Dark City
plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

title: T2 Trainspotting
plot: After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie.

title: Chick Fight
plot: When Anna Wyncomb is introduced to an underground, all-female fight club in order to turn the mess of her life around, she discovers she is much more personally connected to the history of the club than she could ever imagine.

title: The Strange Thing About the Johnsons
plot: A dark domestic horror drama about the ties that bind and the ties that really bind.

title: Jungle
plot: A group of friends join a guide for a trek into the Bolivian jungle, searching for an Indian village. The men soon realize that the jungle is a difficult place to be.

title: The Guardian
plot: A high school swim champion with a troubled past enrolls in the U.S. Coast Guard's "A" School, where legendary rescue swimmer Ben Randall teaches him some hard lessons about loss, love, and self-sacrifice.

title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
plot: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

title: Bachelor Party
plot: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

title: Descendants 3
plot: The teenagers of Disney's most infamous villains return to the Isle of the Lost to recruit a new batch of villainous offspring to join them at Auradon Prep.

title: Young & Hungry
plot: A well-off young tech entrepreneur hires a feisty young food blogger to be his personal chef.

title: White Men Can't Jump
plot: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.

title: Fisherman's Friends
plot: Ten fisherman from Cornwall are signed by Universal Records and achieve a top ten hit with their debut album of Sea Shanties.

title: Unstoppable
plot: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.

title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
plot: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

title: The Illusionist
plot: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

title: Triple 9
plot: A gang of criminals and corrupt cops plan the murder of a police officer in order to pull off their biggest heist yet across town.

title: Something's Gotta Give
plot: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.
